moves.1. d4: d4 is my best first move statistically so I played it.
moves.3. Nf3 Nf6 4. Nc3: Nc3 is flexible in case of e6 transposing into the semi-slav.
moves.4... dxc4: This is the main point of the slav black will try to hold onto his c4 pawn.
moves.5. e4: This will transform into a gambit a4 may have been slightly better.
moves.5... b5 6. e5: forced if I want to hold onto my e pawn.
moves.6... Nd5 7. a4 e6 8. axb5: slight trick black plays the best Nxc3.
moves.8... Nxc3 9. bxc3 cxb5 10. Ng5: Took me a while to rationalize this move.  I felt that Be2 or Ba3 may have been slightly better, though this move doesn't have anything wrong with it.
moves.11. Qg4: Qg4 seem more reasonable than Qh5 the other option for the queen.
moves.11... Bb7 12. Be2 Bd5: Black position is now very solid.
moves.13. O-O a5 14. Ba3: Ba3 trades bishops and stops b4.
moves.14... Bxa3 15. Rxa3 Qb7 16. f4: This move took me about 20 minutes or so to play.  I was also thinking about Bf3 though I feel that I would be going backwards in development.
moves.17. Nf3 b4: I had expected O-O but black played b4 which is more fun!
moves.18. cxb4 axb4 19. Rxa8 Qxa8 20. Qxg7: I finally got my pawn back but, the b and c pawns look ominous.
moves.21... Qa7 22. fxe6 Nc6: Nc6 prepares the very strong Nxd4!
moves.23. exf7+: This is probably the game winning mistake though blacks pawn are strong they are not quite decisive.  I got too greedy here I actually strengthened Nxd4.
moves.23... Rxf7 24. Qxh6 Nxd4: Now I'm in big trouble 25. Nxd4? Qxd4+ 26. Kh1 Rxf1! 27. Bxf1 Qf2 28. Qb1 now black has up a few tempos to play around with while I try to figure out how to not lose a whole piece.  So I chose a different option.
moves.25. Qh8+: 25. Qh8+?! Rf8(what I expected) 26. Qxf8+ Kxf8 27. Nxd4+ giving myself a chance.
moves.25... Kd7: Kd7?! this allows me to save my position in a better way.
moves.28... Qc5 29. h3: gives my king some room though not sure this was best here because it gives black time.
moves.29... c3 30. Qb8+ Ke7 31. Qe5: The point of Qb8+ though I'm completely lost after the next few moves.
moves.31... Bxf3: Best response and one I didn't consider for some reason.
moves.32. Qxc5+ Nxc5 33. Bxf3: I resign here c2 forces a queen.
